dict.string: A collection of keyboard shortcuts for common ZD actions

tell application "Google Chrome"
activate
-- Only execute on active tab set theTab to active tab of window 1
-- Only execute if tab is done loading repeat if (loading of theTab) is false then exit repeat end repeat
-- Only execute on active ticket (since ZD has its own tabbing system) execute theTab javascript " if (typeof tickets === 'undefined') { let tickets = document.getElementsByClassName('ember-view workspace') let ticketsArray = Array.from(tickets)
activeTicket = ticketsArray.filter(ticket => ticket.style.length === 0)[0] } "
end tell

#!/usr/bin/env bash #forked from OneUpdater by Vitor Galvao https://github.com/vitorgalvao/alfred-workflows/blob/master/OneUpdater/README.md
readonly remote_info_plist='https://raw.githubusercontent.com/erikopinaldo/alfred-zendesk-shortcuts/main/info.plist' readonly workflow_url='erikopinaldo/alfred-zendesk-shortcuts' readonly download_type='github_release' readonly frequency_check='4' readonly auth=$(cat '.assets/vars.txt') readonly home_page='https://app.slack.com/client/E12KS1G65/Qp:F0739LHNY5R'
#FROM HERE ON, CODE SHOULD BE LEFT UNTOUCHED! function abort { echo "${1}" >&2 exit 1 }
#check to see if the URL can be reached function url_exists { curl --silent --location -H "${auth}" -H 'Accept: application/vnd.github.v3.raw' --output /dev/null --fail --range 0-0 "${1}" }
#notifications. Uses 'Notificator'. function notification { local -r notificator="$(find . -type f -name 'notificator')" if [[ -f "${notificator}" && "$(/usr/bin/file --brief --mime-type "${notificator}")" == 'text/x-shellscript' ]]; then "${notificator}" --message "${1}" --title "ZD Shortcuts for Alfred" --subtitle "${2}" --sound 'Funk' return fi
#use applescript if Notificator fails osascript -e "display notification \"${1}\" with title \"Alfred ${alfred_workflow_name} Updater \" subtitle \"${2}\"" }
# Local sanity checks readonly local_info_plist='info.plist' readonly local_version="$(/usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'print version' "${local_info_plist}")"
[[ -n "${local_version}" ]] || abort 'You need to set a workflow version in the configuration sheet.'
# Check for updates if [[ $(find "${local_info_plist}" -mtime +"${frequency_check}"d) ]]; then if ! url_exists "${remote_info_plist}"; then abort "'remote_info_plist' (${remote_info_plist}) appears to not be reachable."; fi # Remote sanity check
#this creates a temp file to compare with the local version. readonly tmp_file="$(mktemp)" curl --location --output "${tmp_file}" "${remote_info_plist}" -H "${auth}" -H 'Accept: application/vnd.github.v3.raw' readonly remote_version="$(/usr/libexec/PlistBuddy -c 'print version' "${tmp_file}")"
#compare the local with remote to see if an update is available. if [[ "${local_version}" == "${remote_version}" ]]; then notification 'You are up to date!' touch "${local_info_plist}" # Reset timer by touching local file exit 0 fi
if [[ "${download_type}" == 'page' ]]; then notification 'Launching update in Slack…' open "${workflow_url}" exit 0 fi
download_url="$([[ "${download_type}" == 'github_release' ]] && curl --silent "https://api.github.com/repos/${workflow_url}/releases/latest" | grep 'browser_download_url' | head -1 | sed -E 's/.*browser_download_url": "(.*)"/\1/' || echo "${workflow_url}")" echo "${download_url}"
if url_exists "${download_url}"; then notification 'Downloading and installing…''Update available v'""${remote_version}"" curl -H "${auth}" -H 'Accept: application/vnd.github.v3.raw' --location --output "${HOME}/Downloads/${alfred_workflow_name}-${remote_version}.alfredworkflow" "${download_url}" open "${HOME}/Downloads/${alfred_workflow_name}-${remote_version}.alfredworkflow" else #if the update download cannot be reached, open the workflow channel in TS
open "${home_page}" notification "Download in #watch-erik-code-things" 'Update available v'""${remote_version}"" abort "'workflow_url' (${download_url}) appears to not be reachable." fi fi

tell application "Google Chrome"
-- Only execute on active tab set theTab to active tab of window 1
-- Only execute if tab is done loading repeat if (loading of theTab) is false then exit repeat end repeat
-- Only execute on active ticket (since ZD has its own tabbing system)
delay 0.1
execute theTab javascript "
// Click assignee dropdown menu activeTicket.querySelector(`[data-agent-workspace-onboarding-id='assigneeField']`).click(); "
-- Click on Support assignee
delay 0.5
execute theTab javascript " activeTicket.getElementsByClassName('lkJzpj')[0].click(); "
end tell

tell application "Google Chrome"
activate
-- Only execute on active tab set theTab to active tab of window 1
-- Only execute if tab is done loading repeat if (loading of theTab) is false then exit repeat end repeat
-- Only execute on active ticket (since ZD has its own tabbing system) execute theTab javascript " if (typeof tickets === 'undefined') { let tickets = document.getElementsByClassName('ember-view workspace') let ticketsArray = Array.from(tickets)
activeTicket = ticketsArray.filter(ticket => ticket.style.length === 0)[0] }
// Click assignee dropdown menu activeTicket.querySelectorAll(`[data-agent-workspace-onboarding-id='assigneeField']`)[0].click(); "
-- Click on Support assignee
delay 0.5
execute theTab javascript " activeTicket.getElementsByClassName('lkJzpj')[0].click(); "
end tell

tell application "Google Chrome"
activate
-- Only execute on active tab
set theTab to active tab of window 1
-- Only execute if tab is done loading repeat if (loading of theTab) is false then exit repeat end repeat
-- Only execute on active ticket (since ZD has its own tabbing system) execute theTab javascript "
// Take ticket activeTicket.querySelector(`[data-test-id='assignee-field-take-it-button']`).click(); "
end tell

tell application "Google Chrome"
activate
-- Only execute on active tab set theTab to active tab of window 1
-- Only execute if tab is done loading repeat if (loading of theTab) is false then exit repeat end repeat
-- Only execute on active ticket (since ZD has its own tabbing system)
delay 0.1
execute theTab javascript "
// Take ticket activeTicket.querySelector(`[data-test-id='assignee-field-take-it-button']`).click();
// Click status dropdown menu button activeTicket.querySelector(`[data-test-id='submit_button-menu-button']`).click(); "
-- Submit as Pending
delay 0.5
execute theTab javascript " activeTicket.querySelector(`[data-test-id='submit_button-menu-hold']`).click(); "
end tell

tell application "Google Chrome"
activate
-- Only execute on active tab
set theTab to active tab of window 1
-- Only execute if tab is done loading repeat if (loading of theTab) is false then exit repeat end repeat
-- Only execute on active ticket (since ZD has its own tabbing system) execute theTab javascript "
// Click views refresh button document.querySelector(`[data-test-id='views_views-list_header-refresh']`).click();
"
end tell

tell application "Google Chrome"
activate
-- Only execute on active tab
set theTab to active tab of window 1
-- Only execute if tab is done loading repeat if (loading of theTab) is false then exit repeat end repeat
-- Only execute on active ticket (since ZD has its own tabbing system) execute theTab javascript "
// Click profile icon document.querySelector(`[data-test-id='toolbar-profile-menu-button']`).click();
"
-- Click on profile menu list item
delay 0.5
execute theTab javascript " document.querySelector(`[data-test-id='toolbar-profile-menu'] > #downshift-1-item-0`).click(); "
end tell

tell application "Google Chrome"
activate
-- Only execute on active tab set theTab to active tab of window 1
-- Only execute if tab is done loading repeat if (loading of theTab) is false then exit repeat end repeat
-- Only execute on active ticket (since ZD has its own tabbing system)
delay 0.1
execute theTab javascript "
// Take ticket activeTicket.querySelector(`[data-test-id='assignee-field-take-it-button']`).click();
// Click status dropdown menu button activeTicket.querySelector(`[data-test-id='submit_button-menu-button']`).click(); "
-- Submit as Pending
delay 0.5
execute theTab javascript " activeTicket.querySelector(`[data-test-id='submit_button-menu-pending']`).click(); "
end tell

tell application "Google Chrome"
activate
-- Only execute on active tab
set theTab to active tab of window 1
-- Only execute if tab is done loading repeat if (loading of theTab) is false then exit repeat end repeat
-- Only execute on active ticket (since ZD has its own tabbing system) execute theTab javascript " document.querySelector(`[data-test-id='ticket-detail-next-ticket-button']`).click(); "
end tell

tell application "Google Chrome"
activate
-- Only execute on active tab
set theTab to active tab of window 1
-- Only execute if tab is done loading repeat if (loading of theTab) is false then exit repeat end repeat
-- Only execute on active ticket (since ZD has its own tabbing system)
delay 0.1
execute theTab javascript "
// Take ticket activeTicket.querySelector(`[data-test-id='ticket-composer-toolbar-toolbar-button']`).click(); "
end tell

Keyboard shortcuts for Zendesk.
* Ticket assignment actions * Assign to Support * Assign to Self * Assign to Self and set to On Hold * Assign to Self and set to Pending
* Misc ticket actions * [PLAY MODE] Next ticket * Toggle formatting menu * Close current ticket tab * Copy requester first name
* ZD view shortcuts * Open my profile * Refresh all views * Shortcuts for opening up to 5 Zendesk views (see instructions below)
===========================
HOW TO ADD VIEW SHORTCUTS
===========================
1. Open your ZD view in browser
2. Get the VIEW ID at the end of the URL
3. In the 'Variables' box to the left, double click any value field
4. Paste VIEW ID
5. Import
Self-assign and Submit as On Hold
NOTE: you can always change your saved view shortcuts by clicking the [x] icon at the very top right of Alfred. This icon is in the toolbar that also contains the bug icon.

Check for updates to the ZD Shortcuts Alfred workflow.
If a newer version exists, open download page.
Note: return value has trailing CRLF. This needs to be trimmed in subsequent Alfred steps. For some reason, this Applescript isn't playing nice with trimming

GENERAL NOTE
You'll have to enter your own hotkeys/shortcuts for all of the flows below. To do this:
1. Double click a hotkey block 2. Press your desired hotkey combination

Get Active Ticket Utility Script
DO NOT DELETE
Note: return value has trailing CRLF. This needs to be trimmed in subsequent Alfred steps. For some reason, this Applescript isn't playing nice with trimming

NOTE: These "Visit My X Tickets" flows work on any ZD page. You don't have to already be on a "view" page of ZD. For example, you could currently have a ticket open and still use these flows to visit a ZD view.
Only pass requesterName from previous split
Split requester name value from previous step to create an array with shape [requesterName, CRLF]
Copy Requester First Name (uses Requester dropdown menu)
NOTE: DO NOT DELETE THESE UPDATE BLOCKS
